100458.「グワッハハハ！ 怨霊退治の マネごとなんて\n させられて ワケわかんねぇ……:
Gwahahahaha! You're making a face like you have no idea what's going on, like you're being forced to exorcise a vengeful spirit
or something. Heh heh. It's only natural.

100459.「なんせ オレもよく わかんねぇんだからな！\n わかんなくとも けっこう 毛だ:
I don't really know what's going on either! I
don't know, but I'm covered in fur. Candy Cat
is covered in stripes.

100460.「だがよ 怨霊と踊り子に カンケーが\n ねぇワケでもねぇ。じつは 大昔の\n:
But it's not that I don't care about the
grudge and the dancer. Actually, the dancers
long ago were different from those of today.

100461.「なんでも 歌や踊りに 秘められた\n 呪術的なチカラ…… それを利用して\n:
It is said that their role was to use the
magical power hidden in their songs and dances
to ward off vengeful spirits.

100462.「その昔 マジ強ぇ踊り子が 怨霊の親玉と\n 大戦争やらかしたって 伝説まで残っ:
There is even a legend about a really strong dancer who had a big war with the master of the grudge. So the legend of the dancer is a
legend of a really strong dancer.

100464.「おぅ ラスタ！ いいとこに 帰ってきたな。\n ちょうど <pc>が 例の怨霊:
Oh, Rasta! You've come to the right place.
<pc> just got back from giving that
grudge a good beating.

100465.「怨霊……ああ。この前 話したやつね。:
Grudge...ah. The one I told you about the
other day.

100466.「なんでぃ。反応うすいぜ？ ラスタ。\n ……ははん。さては お前 コイツに\n:
Why? You're not responding well, are
you? Rasta. Huh? Are you worried that he's
going to overtake you?

100467.「グワッハハハ！ まぁ 無理ねぇか。\n コイツってば 古き伝説の マジ強踊り子:
Gwahahahaha! Well, it's no wonder. This guy
has the momentum to overtake even the Old
Dancer's Legend's seriously strong dancer!

100468.「うんにゃ……。\n もうとっくに 追いこしてたりしてな。\n ふっふっふ……。:
Unnya.......they may have already overtaken
him by now. Hmmm...

100470.「いやあ これからは マジ強踊り子で\n 爆売れ伝説の 時代だな！\n マジ強:
Well, from now on, it's the era of the legend
of the dancer who sells like hotcakes! The
legend of the strong dancer! Moo-hoo...

100473.「あんな低級霊 浄化できて当たり前よ。\n 古き伝説の踊り子の強さ……\n 踊り:
No wonder you can purify such a lowly spirit.
The strength of Old Dancer's Legend... the
height of dancing is nothing like that!

100475.「ふっふっふ。オレとしたことが……。\n ありゃ しばらく フキゲン伝説だな……:
Hmph. I'm a legend... I've been... a legend
for a while... but is there anything to be so
angry about?

100476.「最近 やたら ピリピリしてんだよなぁ……。\n まぁ 伝説に名を刻む 踊り子と:
You've been a bit tense lately... well, if you've come to realize that you're a dancer who will go down in the legends... I'm happy
for you.

100477.「つぅワケで <pc>の 成長を\n お披露目すんのも また今度だな。:
So I'll have to show off the growth of
<pc> another time.

100478.「まぁ 安心しろよ。お前ほどの 逸材なら\n ラスタの お眼鏡にかなうようになる:
Well, don't worry. If you're as good as you
think you are, it won't take Hat Hamwitch long
before you're in Rasta's good graces.

100479.「次こそは ビシっと\n 合方として 認めてもらおうぜ！:
Next time, let's get him to recognize us as a
merged team!

103095.「たいしたもんじゃねぇが 景気づけに\n こんなもんを 用意させてもらったぜ。\:
It's not much, but I've prepared this for you
to cheer you up. Keep up the good work.
